name: Auri Cards
description:
An AuriTheAlien-community themed two-player online card game!

The server is currently running v1.0.5, and in order to connect to it, you must be using one of the following versions: v1.0.0, v1.0.1, v1.0.2, v1.0.3, v1.0.4 or v1.0.5

=With Credit to: Simmotipo, Lexente, MelvinCherry, Dishai, WhereAreMyHerbs, RareWhiteWolf26, Savvamon, Dynamite_Racoon, WattIsDat, LyricalLuke, JonWildCat, Marqus32, Ocramc, CanvasTheWolf, Jackbox Games
